document.full_text: lebron james said that kyrie irving, the likely top draft selection, was a great talent but that it would be tough for him to be a franchise player immediately.
document.title: james tempers expectations for cavaliers' no. 1 pick
lines_and_colors: lebron james said that kyrie irving, the likely top draft selection, was a great talent but that it would be tough for him to be a franchise player immediately.
